extendedInfo.description: The soundboard you've been waiting for now available for your Android device! Metal Gear Soundboard features all your favorite sounds clips from the series! Listen to sound effect clips and quotes from characters such as Solid Snake, Big Boss, Raiden, Otacon (Hal Emmerich), Roy Campbell, (Colonel Campbell), Gray Fox (Frank Yaeger), Revolver Ocelot, Kazuhira Miller (Kaz), Liquid Snake, Psycho Mantis, Johnny, Solidus Snake (George Sears), Jetstream Sam, Sundowner and Senator Steven Armstrong! This soundboard features sounds from the games Metal Gear Solid, Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty, Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, Metal Gear Solid: Portable Ops, Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots, Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker, Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance and from the upcoming Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain. Why not carry around those Metal Gear moments with you wherever you go? Try it out for free!App features:* 290 sounds from the series!* Set sounds as ringtones, notification tone or as alarm tone!* Save sounds to your SD card!* Sleek and easy to use user interface!* Allows user to export app to SD card!* Share the app with your friends!Note:* You can navigate tabs by either touching the titles at the top, or by swiping the screen.* More sounds on each page can be found by scrolling.* To set a sound as a ringtone, notification tone or an alarm tone simply hold down a button.* Sounds are saved to media/audio/ringtones on your SD card.* Updates will now only be applied to devices with Android 2.2 and above. Apologies for any inconvenience.Permissions fully explained:* FULL INTERNET ACCESS- For displaying small banner advert* MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS- For saving ringtones to the SD card* MODIFY GLOBAL SYSTEM SETTINGS- For setting up ringtonesMetal Gear is developed by Kojima Productions and is property of Konami Computer Entertainment Japan. No copyright infringement intended.A DeadlyFastApps 2013 Production.

reviews.title: Great fan service
reviews.comment: Does what I want, makes me feel like I\'m in MGS2 whenever I hear the codec ring for a text
reviews.author: SolidSneakNinja

reviews.title: Great Quality, Just a little bug.
reviews.comment: Sound are great! Just bugs out after setting them. Tried shutting down app manually still bugs out. Fix and will give 5 stars. LG Optimus
reviews.author: Karlton Ruddick

reviews.title: Error! Check SD card
reviews.comment: Loved the app, but now it doesn\'t work it all.  If I try to save/set as anything I get that error msg.  HTC Incredible (the 1st one not 2)
reviews.author: Martin Rom

reviews.title: As a long time, die hard MGS fan..
reviews.comment: I\'d have to say this app is pretty convenient. I\'ve had this app for some time now and the update does it justice. I definitely recommend this app to any fan of the series. 1 day left until the Legacy Collection is released. This app would go perfect with it and vice versa.   -MrFOXHOUND
reviews.author: Nacoda Crowder

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: One of the best metal gear solid soundboards around. New update is visually great.  My friends that have an I phone  want this app badly. But can\'t because of being on apple. Keep up the great work.
reviews.author: Dylan Gabbert

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I wish it had more Jack \"Raiden\" voice clips from Metal Gear Solid 4 and Metal Gear Rising though.
reviews.author: Jacob Ortiz

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Please add some more for Raiden from Rising. Like his evil laugh or even his combo sounds. And some funny stuff like doomp. Maybe even some dark stuff he says in the beginning. Other than that great app. Thank you very much for this. I have loved MGS for 15 years now!
reviews.author: Alex B

reviews.title: Finally!!!
reviews.comment: I was waiting for a great Metal Gear soundboard and this delivers on all counts!! So many sounds and most are excellent quality. Superb job!
reviews.author: Armand Sellers

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: It has almost everything but they have to add more in kaz and ocelot! Don\'t add kiefer\'s voice!
reviews.author: Fox Hound

reviews.title: nWo 4 Life
reviews.comment: Sweet!
reviews.author: Josh Eilers

reviews.title: Excellent! Good memories. With this game
reviews.comment: Could you please add the mgs1 boss battle theme?
reviews.author: Zayd Anderson

reviews.title: MGS!
reviews.comment: Am a girl am MGS favorite fan my fav guy in MGS4 is Raiden he\'s AWESOME
reviews.author: Farah Irdina

reviews.comment: Pretty good.
reviews.author: Gideon Jones

reviews.title: Awesome tones
reviews.comment: Im one big MGS fan but does it need the modify system settings permission which screws every phone if not dev properly.
reviews.author: Stacy Elkin

reviews.title: Great soundboard
reviews.comment: New update is very nice
reviews.author: Joshua White

reviews.title: Love the new update...
reviews.comment: Only problem is after listening to a couple sounds, the audio stops working... Starts working again after clicking on one of Liquid\'s sounds and going back... Oh, and the app looks better than ever! Thank you!
reviews.author: Jonathan Ollivierre

reviews.title: Yey
reviews.comment: I think with being able to play multiple sounds at once esp with the theme/sounds. Really enjoyable app but seems like after a certain number of plays on a character\'s page results in silence and you have to move to another to continue. Apart from these faults, I  really enjoying it! Fix bugs and more quotes for 5 *
reviews.author: Collette White

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this app, my big recommendation, add more clips from MGS3, like Snake\'s \"Who are the patriots?\" or quotes from Eva.
reviews.author: Dominic DiMichele

reviews.title: It wont let me download!
reviews.comment: It keeps saying package is invalid!
reviews.author: eman yousef

reviews.title: New isn\'t always better!
reviews.comment: Buddy great job, but im confused about the new update..?? Bosses from metal gear rising but nothing for raven mgs1... priorities!!!
